name: Nuts About Notes
shortDescription: A fun, gamified music education app that takes children on an adventure with the character Willie to learn how to read musical notes on the staff.
fullDescription:
Nuts About Notes! is an educational adventure game designed to teach children and students how to read and identify musical notes. Join Willie, the friendly mascot, on a journey through the 'Ultimate Guitar World' to discover the secrets of reading sheet music.

Key Features:

- Gamified Learning: Progress through an engaging map interface (as seen in screenshot 1) by completing various levels and musical challenges.
- Interactive Quizzes: Learn note identification through fun, card-matching-style quizzes that link note names (like F and E) to their positions on the Treble Clef staff (as seen in screenshot 6).
- Progress Tracking: Features a dedicated screen that displays 'Notes You Have Learned So Far,' showing your mastery of notes across different levels on the musical staff.
- Customizable Experience: The Settings menu allows users (Parents/Teachers) to track student 'Progress' and 'Level' completion, and control sound, music, and instrument settings.
- User Profiles: Supports entering a username to save and track individual progress.
